item.description:
I'm very excited about November's brunch, we're going to CAV in Providence.

This is my favorite restaurant in the city.

http://cavrestaurant.com/

There isn't a brunch menu on their website but, if you look under the menu tab, you'll see some examples of brunch options. 

This is an a la carte brunch, not a buffet.  And their food is great !

As usual, everyone is responsible to pay for their own alcoholic beverages at brunch.  All food and non-alcoholic beverages will be combined on 1 bill, tax and tip will be added, and the bill will be evenly divided by the number of attendees.

I hope you can make it !
item.name: November Brunch - CAV in Providence
